title: Wow stats changer, newest!
description:
World of Warcraft Stat Changer 3.0
compatible with latest patch 2.3.2	

This is a release from a \"sercret group\" which normally does not release this software for the public. They\&#039;ve been doing this for about 1 year now and they only send their software via their forum for accepted members.

I registered an account there 3 months ago and started posting seriously in their public forum and finally I got accepted to the private \"room\" where I could download this.

And unlike the stat changer from wow-toolbox.com/wow-advantage.com, THIS ONE ACTUALLY WORKS!!
I\&#039;ve tried it and it\&#039;s real simple.

For the newbs who doesn\&#039;t know what this do =):
It changes your stats (Strength, Agility, Stamina, intellect, Spirit) to whatever you want. You can have 1000 Agility if you want to :P
Tip: Don\&#039;t have like 1000000 stamina or something, people would become suspicious :P



Here\&#039;s how you do:
1. Download the software to your World of Warcraft folder
2. Open the software and it will automaticly extract needed fils to the folder
3. Run WoW.exe while the stat changer is running
4. Log in to your account and character
5. While you are logged in, tab to the stat changer and select how much strength, agility, stamina, intellect and spirit
you would like to have and then press \"apply changes!\"
6. Finished! Enjoy ;)
